sections.heading: 395.1 through 396.28 of this title, and Sections 24 through 26 of this act shall be known and may be cited as the "Funeral Services Licensing Act"
sections.text: Added by Laws 1989, c. 297, ยง 1, eff. Nov. 1, 1989. Amended by Laws 1999, c. 64, ยง 1, eff. July 1, 1999; Laws 2003, c. 57, ยง 1, emerg. eff. April 10, 200
